title: Laurie Hernandez's guide to Tokyo 2020
description:
The full lowdown on what to watch from Olympic champion gymnast Laurie Hernandez. After missing out on the U.S. trials due to injury, Laurie has managed to secure a spot in Tokyo as a commentator for NBC. She shares her insights on the USA gymnastics team, Simone Biles, her amateur karate past, and her somewhat inconsistent culinary skills. Warning: this podcast contains a lot of laughter.


Link to Joe Fraser Podcast: https://olympics.com/en/podcast/podcast-joe-fraser-gymnastics-world-champion-emotions-believing-interview
